events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request related to order fulfillment problems.
An agent specializing in refund claims has been assigned to this case to assist the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the incorrect product you received. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the product you received to verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 678945. I’ve attached a photo showing that the item is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been successfully processed. Please check your account for the refund details and let us know if you have any other questions.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Please feel free to contact us again if you need further assistance.
